The diagram depicts using an MTA on the e-mail servers as a continuation of Diagram 2. E-mail server 1 forwards e-mail to recipient@domain.com, which arrives at the second e-mail server that is labeled mail delivery agent (MDA). A speech bubble above the MDA server says: "Is the recipient in my list of recipients? Yes. Place e-mail in recipient's mailbox." The e-mail message is delivered to the recipient (M UA).

The caption text states: "Mail Delivery Agent process governs delivery of e-mail between servers and clients".
